segments.text: This kitchen scene has me on edge just observing it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's running and the basin is full, spilling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A sheet of water pours onto the floor, forming a puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is polishing dishes, her back to the real problem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One foot's in the water, but she keeps on drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked bowls nearby could topple into the wet mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet reveals the cookie jar stuffed full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's climbing precariously, hand inside grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His posture is all wrong; the stool might give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watches expectantly, arm raised high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sharing a sneaky moment without mom knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tied-back curtains frame a view of the neat garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside looks idyllic, hiding the indoor perils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad how routine tasks blind her to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching; something's bound to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
